desc: Mingala Day Spa is an award winning beauty salon in Athlone. We offer online booking, online and contactless payments, free parking, special offers, online shop, online gift vouchers and a luxury relaxing experience.

layout.text:
Award Winning Day Spa and Beauty Salon in Athlone. Located in the Shamrock Lodge Hotel. We offer a luxury relaxing experience with a warm welcome.
Online Booking | Free Parking
Contactless Payments | Online Gift Vouchers
